title: Remembering Catherine O'Hara: A Funny Actress Who Made Us Laugh
summary: Catherine O'Hara was a famous actress who made people laugh in movies and TV shows. She was best known for playing funny roles in films like Home Alone and Beetlejuice, and she won an award for her part in Schitt's Creek. She was from Canada and started her career in a comedy group called Second City. Sadly, she passed away at age 71 after being sick for a short time. Her friends and co-stars, like Macaulay Culkin from Home Alone, shared nice memories about her. She was loved by many people around the world for her humor and kindness.
